div.p:
Due to several confirmed cases of COVID-19 in Leipsic, the school district will be altering work schedules and expectations. Commencing on Monday, April 20...the foyer at the elementary school entrance will be closed. Students and parents are not permitted in any portion of the school building. School administrators will be working in their offices periodically; however, there will be no specific office hours. If a parent or student has a concern, please call the school and LEAVE A MESSAGE. Someone will get back with you as soon as they can.
We are sorry for the inconvenience that this may cause, but we want everyone to be safe. Please take care of yourselves and look out for others.

Leipsic Local MS/HS Academic Online Schedule Effective April 13th, 2020 for Grades 6-12
We recognize that the past 3 weeks have presented a challenging transition to online learning for everyone. We wanted to take a moment to thank our TEACHERS and STAFF who have done an amazing job of transitioning from in-person learning to on-line learning. As educators, they are trained to teach students face to face, and we feel they have done an amazing job transitioning to a digital format. As with any transition, there are always learning curves, and we continue to refine our processes. Our first change in this process is to designate one day per week for departments to assign work for the ensuing week. In addition, each department will hold their Schoology/Google meetings with students on their assigned day of the week. This way, students will only receive work in one or two subjects daily opposed to six or seven. It is our hope that this will allow everyone – students, parents/guardians, and teachers – to better manage assignments for each course. Further, based in guidance from the Ohio Department of Education, the total work assigned should be no more than 2 hours per subject weekly. Leipsic MS/HS would like to keep it to no more than 90 minutes per subject. The only exception will be for those students who are enrolled in AP and CCP courses as there are currently expectations set by post-secondary institutions and the College Board for these students to complete certain assignments in order to earn college credit. These changes will take effect on Monday, April 13th, 2020. Monday
Math
Spanish FFA Tuesday
English / Language Arts
Health / PE
Family Consumer Sciences Wednesday
Social Studies
Music Courses
Art Courses Thursday
Science
Technology Classes (Odysseyware/Mr. Newell, Computer Apps/Mrs. Rieman)
Business Classes Friday
Work Day for ALL Courses

Students in Grades K-5 who have wifi but are having issues logging in to Clever at home............ Call the Elementary office 419-943-2165 x4062 and request to borrow a device. You need to setup a pickup time with the office.

p.span: The district is committed to providing individuals with disabilities an opportunity equal to that of their nondisabled peers. If you have an issue with this website, please email the Webmaster lp_webmaster@lp.noacsc.org with your concerns.

Disclaimer: The Leipsic Local School District makes every effort to verify that all links are operational and all information is accurate, appropriate and of high quality. The District expects that these standards are met. The viability of links that are not created through our District cannot be guaranteed.
